nodes.bodyText: It would be nice to have a unit test or two for the angleCounts configurable.

I think we may run into a situation where the vertex of 2 segments contains 2 nodes --1 node belonging to the meeting segments and another stray node which would be a Segment of length 0. So there's actually 3 segments all connected. We could log something so it's clear why we're skipping this kind of polygon
